main.head: Italy prepares for vote that could sink Berlusconi – video
main.p: This article is more than 13 years old

Italian parliamentarians get ready for a crucial vote on public finances that could sink the prime minister, Silvio Berlusconi, if enough party rebels desert him. Berlusconi has denied reports that his resignation is imminent as he struggles to hold his centre-right coalition together, but the increased political uncertainty in Italy has added to turmoil in Europe, hitting global markets
